articles.description: Auburn delivered the third-seeded Beavers a heartbreaking end to a season of high expectations.
articles.content:
CORVALLIS And just like that, poof, it was over.
A season that seemed preordained for Omaha and a national championship chase vanished Monday night amid a dogpile of navy blue and burnt orange, with… [+7317 chars]
